data.message: Hey, been a fan since your first song release. its been a while... but i was hoping that you could please release a book with all your song lyrics in the one book. could do an chapter for each album. the internet wasn't that great with looking up lyrics back then. but now i think it's a perfect time. please let me know if you do create one... and i'll be the first to buy it :) thank you for being you :)
